casebody.data:
Sharay FREEMAN
v.
A BETTER WAY WHOLESALE AUTOS, INC. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2017

Kenneth A. Votre, in support of the petition.

Richard F. Wareing, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 649, 166 A.3d 857 (2017), is denied.
